segments.text: In this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet's running and the sink is full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not noticing the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy stands on a stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the open jar above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unsteady, leaning back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating quietly behind the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening unnoticed here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary scene hides some real tension.
segments.speaker: PAR
